name: Aws-Thought
description: This project is a code refactor of a previous project of mine, Deep Thoughts. This social media application allows users to post text as a thought and also allows users to upload images along with their thoughts. Hosted on Amazon Web Services IaaS platform utilizing an EC2 instance, S3 bucket for image uploads and DynamoDB relational databse.

name: Fit-Club
description: A social media website focusing on allowing users to submit and track fitness goals, find and communicate with personal trainers and attend virtual training sessions and manage workouts.

name: Wo-Ve-Mi
description: A business address search engine highlighting Women, Veteran and Minority owned estalishments. Data from the SAM api is displayed with dymanically created cards and Mapbox api.

name: D.O.G.S.
description: A full-stack dog-themed social media website to connect dog owners searching for play-mates for their furry friends.

name: Readme Generator
description: A command line interface application designed to generate consistent professional READMEs with ease.

name: Tech Blog
description: A blog-style CMS. This project is my first complete full stack application. Sign up and post a blog!
